participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emma finds joy in baking and crafting. She is introspective and often contemplates deeper subjects like life and death.
participant_1.background: I've a dogs. I'm scared of dying. Knitting is my passion. The county wide bake sale is where I feel most at home. I love to bake cookies.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Curious and expressive, Liam enjoys exploring new ideas and sharing his thoughts. He has a playful side and is passionate about his interests.
participant_2.background: I try various coffees as a hobby. I enjoy poetry. I played football for a division A college. I'm a huge Star Wars fan.

content.text: Hey! Are you scared of dying? Because I am.
I like to bake, but I love to bake
did he? Interesting! I'm waiting on the new iPhone!
